body.name: Dash Cam Front 1080P WiFi, Mini Dash Camera for Cars with App Control, 170° Wide Angle, G-Sensor, Loop Recording, Super Night Vision, Safer Super Capacitor for Dashcam Car Camera, MAX 64GB
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 22 mins
features: 【Crystal Clear 1080P Resolution and Night Recording】 Experience unrivaled clarity with the AQV OK305 dash cam. Boasting a 170° wide-angle lens, F2.0 large aperture, WDR, and night vision, it delivers impeccable footage even in low-light scenarios such as nighttime or tunnels. This powerful dash cam front is your trusted companion for cars, trucks, and SUVs, providing crucial evidence in the event of accidents.

【Seamless Built-in WiFi and Intuitive APP Control】 Elevate your control with the AQV OK305. Its built-in WiFi feature connects seamlessly to the "OKCAR" app, available for both Android and iOS smartphones. Enjoy live streaming, download videos, tweak settings, edit footage, and effortlessly share your captures with friends and family on social media. With the user-friendly "OKCAR" app, managing your dash cam has never been simpler.

【Effortless Installation and User-Friendly Operation】The AQV OK305 mini dash cam is designed for simplicity. Its slim and compact profile ensures it never obstructs your view, offering easy installation even for first-time users. Follow the detailed instructions to mount the dash camera on your car's windshield and connect it to the cigarette lighter with the provided car charger cable. The dash cam automatically enters recording mode when you start the engine, ensuring you never miss a moment.

【Smart G-Sensor and Time-lapse Functionality】 Your safety is paramount with the AQV OK305 car camera. When your vehicle experiences vibrations due to impact, the dash cam springs into action, initiating video recording and locking the footage. For continuous monitoring, connect the car camera to the hardwire kit, enabling the Time-lapse function. This ensures the integrity of recorded content while conserving memory space, making your dash cam a reliable 24-hour sentinel.

【24-Month Warranty and Essential Tips】 Rest assured with the AQV OK305 Dash Cam's 24-month warranty. Feel free to reach out to us regarding any inquiries or ongoing issues, and our responsive support team will promptly assist you. The AQV OK305 Dash Cam supports up to 64GB memory cards (not included), to ensure optimal performance, remember to format the Micro SD card before recording.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: AQV DASH CAM-ADVANCED QUALITY VIDEO FOR YOUR DRIVING AQV has been committed to redefining road safety through our advanced quality dash cams. Our mission is to provide you with superior, reliable, and easy-to-use solutions that enhance your driving experience. AQV, which stands for "Advanced Quality Video" is not just a name, it's a promise of excellence.

Effortless WiFi Connection & Intuitive App The AQV OK305 Dash Cam features built-in WiFi, providing a seamless connection to your Android or iOS smartphone via our user-friendly app. This allows you to access live video, effortlessly download recordings, customize settings, edit footage, and easily share your memorable journeys with friends and family on platforms like YouTube, Twitter, and Facebook. It's all at your fingertips for a streamlined experience.

G-sensor and Emergency Lock Utilizing a more advanced accident locking chip and G-sensor technology detects any sudden bumps or collisions and immediately locks the video file. This ensures that crucial evidence is preserved, preventing the footage from being overwritten. Whether it's an accident on the road or an unexpected incident, your valuable video evidence is securely saved. Effortless Continuous Recording Enjoy seamless recording with the loop recording feature. Older footage is automatically deleted to make space for new recordings, so you never run out of storage. Mini dash cam supports up to 64GB Micro SD card (not included). 24/7 Continuous Monitoring By connecting the camera to your car's battery using the dash cam hardwire kit(not included), it continues recording even after you've parked and turned off the engine. This ensures that potential incidents or accidents are captured, offering all-day protection for your vehicle and peace of mind as your silent guardian.

Expansive 170° Wide Angle Vision Our OK305 Dash Cam boasts a wide 170° angle that effortlessly captures the entire front view of your car. It skillfully covers all three traffic lanes, providing you with an extended perspective, ensuring you never miss a detail. Precision-Crafted 6-glass Lens The OK305 Dash Cam features a meticulously crafted 6-element glass lens. This lens technology skillfully manipulates light to enhance penetration, resulting in incredibly lifelike images. Enjoy clarity and vividness like never before, even in challenging lighting conditions. Versatile 360° Rotatable Bracket With the innovative 360° rotatable bracket, you have the freedom to adjust the camera angle to your liking. Whether you want to record the road ahead or the interior of your car, this flexibility ensures you capture the perfect shot effortlessly. Package Content AQV Dash CamCar ChargerAdhesive PadUSB charging cableCar Wiring Trim ToolElectrostatic FilmCard PinUser ManualPackaging Box

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great little camera...
reviews.reviewText: I like how small and discreet this little camera is. I mounted it up behind my rearview mirror and totally forget about it while in the car because it's not seen. The provided power cable has more than enough length to hide it through your interior panels and if you turn the voice off, you can get in, drive off, and know that your drive is being recorded without even thinking about it. That's the *only* thing I do not like about this unit.. . . the annoying voice prompts, but as previously stated, you can turn it off in the settings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple and Reliable Performance
reviews.reviewText: The AQV Dash Cam offers protection in the form of visual evidence in a simple, and basic form. Basically, if it is attached to your cars power via the supplied cigarette lighter adaptor, it turns on and starts recording when you start your car. And really, that is as difficult as it needs to be. It will record in 1-minute loops, automatically erasing the oldest of them when the inserted SD is full. That’s all the features you need, in my opinion. Thus far, it has performed that task reliably.The camera has one resolution, 1080FHD at 30fps, that is plenty if you’re not trying to view license plates that were 100 yards away. Image quality with whatever the lens/sensor combination may be is pretty decent, enhanced as it is with WDR.The AQV does have an associated app that can be downloaded, one that fortunately does not require creating an account and password. If you’d like to see what the camera is seeing or change settings, you connect the app to the camera via your phones Wi-Fi setting. I found the connection to take place without much fuss, another attribute of the AQV I appreciated. Once in the settings menu there are a number of settings, although I found the defaults to be just fine. If you find that the AQV starts recording emergency videos when there isn’t an emergency, then the G-Sensor setting can be adjusted to less sensitivity. So far, this has not been a problem. Curiously, there is a setting for “Voice Prompt,” but there is no mention of a voice prompt capability in the little multi-language booklet that is provided as a user manual. Thus far, the AQV has remained mute to any of my inquiries, even when being my most polite. In fact, the AQV has a very limited vocabulary, spoken with a female voice using the English language with Chinese syntax. My kind of girl.The AQV Dash Cam is supplied with everything noted by the seller on the point of purchase page. You stick it on your windshield, run the wiring under the car’s interior molding with the supplied hooked tool, and plug it in. Start your car and it starts recording, turn off your car and it stops. There is a button on the side that allows the user to start and stop recording. Along with video recording it records a sound track. You can tell it not to do this in the settings menu. If you are involved in an impact, the Dash Cam will automatically start recording an “Emergency Video.” There is no reference to what that is in the manual, but I am assuming it is distinguished by the fact that it won’t be automatically erased; but without further inquiry, I don’t know that for a fact. But I’m not going to inquire farther.Apparently, as asseverated by the seller, you can “Enjoy live streaming, download videos, tweak settings, edit footage, and effortlessly share your captures with friends and family on social media.” Is that safe?I appreciate the simplicity of this device, and for my part, have it installed for no other reasons than to record anything that might impact my automobile or anything I might hit. Of course, we all hope neither of those things should come to pass.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m like is easy to install

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: You need to be in or very near your car to monitor the camera. Also, the app does not store the videos on the phone. You need to be connected to wifi in order to view the content of the sd card. Not sure if you are able to save the video unless you remove the sd card and download it to your pc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor app quality
reviews.reviewText: The app required to use the camera is difficult to navigate. The loading messages are phrased odd and are not user friendly at all. I recommend not buying this product and purchasing a dash cam with a better app

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars simply not worth the hassle
reviews.reviewText: Honestly this one was such a pain to set up that we simply don't use it.The cord for one different than others we have had in the past.Also it is so ridiculously short and makes it quite awkward to try to even put this in a spot that not only would work right but can be plugged in.The video is not the best of the 4 we have been using.In fact the video is a bit lacking in quality which makes it a bit of a why bother device.This one to us has just not been worth the hassle to deal with it.We have deal with quality issues and lack of staying connected just not had to deal with such with my others so nope I pass on this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good picture quality. Great value
reviews.reviewText: Right out of the packaging, this camera feels different. Constructed with a metal housing (vs plastic), it feels solid. Its many impressive features are too numerous to list, but the important thing to mention is the beautifully clear, high-definition picture this camera captures.I wish I had this dash cam installed when a hit-and-run driver rear-ended my new car recently. It might have caught his license plate as he sped off. This incident was my motivation in ordering this dash cam. This camera records on a continuous loop. From the camera’s menu, I chose the 5-minute loop. After recording video for five minutes, the camera records the next five minute video over the previous. If there is an image worth saving, simply push a button on the side and that video will be preserved. Easy! It also has a built-in sensor to detect the impact of a collision. In this case, the camera automatically preserves the video.Like I mentioned earlier, the camera has too many features to list in this review, but this also touches on the one weakness of this camera…the manual. It’s not well-written and fails to explain some of the camera’s options. This wasn’t a big issue. I scrolled through the camera’s various menus and figured most of it out quickly. I relied on the internet to answer a few questions on features and settings the manual didn’t cover well.Overall, it’s a great camera at a good price. It provides a little peace-of-mind while out on the increasingly chaotic roads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size, it's discreet in the glass. It can be moved easily. And the quality is good, it has a great angle!
